FuncDef: This command configures the maximum time, in minutes, before a key re-exchange is initiated by the server.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the time interval, in minutes, after which the SSH client will initiate the                        key-re-exchange. Values-1 to 1440. ParamDefault: Default- 60
Specifies that a session will never timeout. To re-enable minutes, enter the command without the disable option.
